#
# Build the module: `keypress`
#

cmake_minimum_required( VERSION 3.20 )

find_program(CCACHE_PROGRAM ccache)
if(CCACHE_PROGRAM)
    set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY RULE_LAUNCH_COMPILE "${CCACHE_PROGRAM}")
endif()

set(VERSION 1.0)
project( UMTSM-KeyPressEventGenerator VERSION ${VERSION} LANGUAGES CXX)

include(GNUInstallDirs)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 23)
set(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE Debug)

include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

# add_compile_options(-Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic)

# includes extra rules if any
if(EXISTS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/CMakeExtras.cmake)
  include(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/CMakeExtras.cmake)
endif()
if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Keypress_Types.hh")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Keypress_Types.hh.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Keypress_Types.hh")
endif()

if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Keypress_UserTypes.hh")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Keypress_UserTypes.hh.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Keypress_UserTypes.hh")
endif()

set(keypress_HEADER Keypress_Types.hh Keypress_UserTypes.hh )

#
# Build State Machine `KeyPressEventGenerator`
#
if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyPressEventGenerator_Auxilary.cpp")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyPressEventGenerator_Auxilary.cpp.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyPressEventGenerator_Auxilary.cpp")
endif()

if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyPressEventGenerator_DataType.hh")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyPressEventGenerator_DataType.hh.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyPressEventGenerator_DataType.hh")
endif()

if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyPressEventGenerator_DataType.cpp")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyPressEventGenerator_DataType.cpp.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyPressEventGenerator_DataType.cpp")
endif()

set(LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_SOURCE KeyPressEventGenerator_DataType.cpp KeyPressEventGenerator.cpp KeyPressEventGenerator_Auxilary.cpp)
set(LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_HEADER ${keypress_HEADER} KeyPressEventGenerator_DataType.hh KeyPressEventGenerator.hh)

add_library(LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_Shared SHARED
  ${LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_SOURCE}
  ${LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_HEADER}
  ${LIBKeyPressEventGenerator_SOURCE_EXTRA}
  ${LIBKeyPressEventGenerator_HEADER_EXTRA})
set_target_properties(LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_Shared PROPERTIES VERSION 1.0.0)
set_target_properties(LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_Shared PROPERTIES SOVERSION 1)
set_target_properties(LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_Shared PROPERTIES POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)
set_target_properties(LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_Shared PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "KeyPressEventGenerator")
target_include_directories(LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_Shared PRIVATE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")
if(DEFINED LIBKeyPressEventGenerator_INCLUDES_EXTRA)
  target_include_directories(LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_Shared PRIVATE "${LIBKeyPressEventGenerator_INCLUDES_EXTRA}")
endif()
if(DEFINED LIBKeyPressEventGenerator_LIB_EXTRA)
  target_link_libraries(LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_Shared ${LIBKeyPressEventGenerator_LIB_EXTRA})
endif()
if (CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
  target_compile_options(LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_Shared PRIVATE "-O4")
  target_compile_options(LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_Shared PRIVATE "-fdata-sections" "-ffunction-sections")
endif()

add_library(LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_Static STATIC
  ${LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_SOURCE}
  ${LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_HEADER}
  ${LIBKeyPressEventGenerator_SOURCE_EXTRA}
  ${LIBKeyPressEventGenerator_HEADER_EXTRA})
set_target_properties(LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_Static PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "KeyPressEventGenerator")
target_include_directories(LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_Static PRIVATE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")
if(DEFINED LIBKeyPressEventGenerator_INCLUDES_EXTRA)
  target_include_directories(LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_Static PRIVATE "${LIBKeyPressEventGenerator_INCLUDES_EXTRA}")
endif()
if (CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
  target_compile_options(LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_Static PRIVATE "-O4")
  target_compile_options(LIBRKeyPressEventGenerator_Static PRIVATE "-fdata-sections" "-ffunction-sections")
endif()

#
# Build State Machine `KeyPress`
#
if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyPress_Auxilary.cpp")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyPress_Auxilary.cpp.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyPress_Auxilary.cpp")
endif()

if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyPress_DataType.hh")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyPress_DataType.hh.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyPress_DataType.hh")
endif()

if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyPress_DataType.cpp")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyPress_DataType.cpp.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/KeyPress_DataType.cpp")
endif()

set(LIBRKeyPress_SOURCE KeyPress_DataType.cpp KeyPress.cpp KeyPress_Auxilary.cpp)
set(LIBRKeyPress_HEADER ${keypress_HEADER} KeyPress_DataType.hh KeyPress.hh)

add_library(LIBRKeyPress_Shared SHARED
  ${LIBRKeyPress_SOURCE}
  ${LIBRKeyPress_HEADER}
  ${LIBKeyPress_SOURCE_EXTRA}
  ${LIBKeyPress_HEADER_EXTRA})
set_target_properties(LIBRKeyPress_Shared PROPERTIES VERSION 1.0.0)
set_target_properties(LIBRKeyPress_Shared PROPERTIES SOVERSION 1)
set_target_properties(LIBRKeyPress_Shared PROPERTIES POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)
set_target_properties(LIBRKeyPress_Shared PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "KeyPress")
target_include_directories(LIBRKeyPress_Shared PRIVATE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")
if(DEFINED LIBKeyPress_INCLUDES_EXTRA)
  target_include_directories(LIBRKeyPress_Shared PRIVATE "${LIBKeyPress_INCLUDES_EXTRA}")
endif()
if(DEFINED LIBKeyPress_LIB_EXTRA)
  target_link_libraries(LIBRKeyPress_Shared ${LIBKeyPress_LIB_EXTRA})
endif()
if (CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
  target_compile_options(LIBRKeyPress_Shared PRIVATE "-O4")
  target_compile_options(LIBRKeyPress_Shared PRIVATE "-fdata-sections" "-ffunction-sections")
endif()

add_library(LIBRKeyPress_Static STATIC
  ${LIBRKeyPress_SOURCE}
  ${LIBRKeyPress_HEADER}
  ${LIBKeyPress_SOURCE_EXTRA}
  ${LIBKeyPress_HEADER_EXTRA})
set_target_properties(LIBRKeyPress_Static PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "KeyPress")
target_include_directories(LIBRKeyPress_Static PRIVATE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")
if(DEFINED LIBKeyPress_INCLUDES_EXTRA)
  target_include_directories(LIBRKeyPress_Static PRIVATE "${LIBKeyPress_INCLUDES_EXTRA}")
endif()
if (CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
  target_compile_options(LIBRKeyPress_Static PRIVATE "-O4")
  target_compile_options(LIBRKeyPress_Static PRIVATE "-fdata-sections" "-ffunction-sections")
endif()

# End CMakeList.txt
